column5: Oops missed the day
you did miss the day but the draft didnt happen so im not to sure whats goijng to happen now
pm stoty and get him your email address, he'll add you in, and we can run the draft anytime before the season starts
We've now got our 8 teams. Thanks everyone.
It's that time again! Annual OFC hockey pool! Open to the first 16 people who reply with their email address.  Wonder how high Kessel will be drafted this season?! LOL
While playing besides Sid?  Top 5.  He is going to rack up the points this season.
With the amount of Kessel lovers on here...I wouldn't be shocked he goes #2. Lol Or....are they all Kessel haters now?!
Sure...what are the details on it (costs, etc.).
Yip im in  Whats the details?

No cost or anything, just for bragging rights.  Head to head scoring - you're against a different opponent each week. The teams are compared in various stat categories and you get a head to head record from it. (8-1-1 for example if you beat your opponent in 8 categories, lose 1 and tie 1). Your records are year-long and each week is added to the previous total.  Example Week 1 - 8-1-1      Week 2 - 4-5-1      Week 3 - 5-3-2 Overall record would be 17-9-4  Anyone that wants in, please PM me with your email address and I'll send the pool invite.
Sounds fun!
I wonder how many laffs will be chosen
Good to have you back running it, lots of glitches last season   I'm in.
When would be a good time for everyone for the live online draft?  Mid Sept? Any week nights that people can't do?
While playing besides Sid?  Top 5.  He is going to rack up the points this season.  Gee I hope so. My aunt could get points playing with Sid. We'll wait though and give Kessel the credit. LOL

The talk about Kessel being on the same line as Crosby reminds me when Heatley signed with San Jose and he was going to be paired with Thornton.  I think and hope Kessels gonna finally get 50, but when it comes to the pool I wonder whos gonna take the chance and pick Edmontons 1st overall pick.  I remember Crosby and Ovie getting 100 points there first season.
I run another pool as well, which is a keeper pool and I have 1st pick this year. McDavid is going #1. Lol
